titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to the treatment of certain areas in applying the purchase price requirements applicable to mortgage revenue bonds.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H297-298)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/27/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require modification of the purchase price limits under the mortgage revenue bond program to reflect housing costs in Westchester County, New York.
